pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Monrovia, Liberia

6:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Roberts International Airport in Monrovia, Liberia.

Roberts International Airport
Monrovia, Liberia

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, President of the Republic of Liberia.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and President Sirleaf will hold a joint media availability.

Foyer, Main Floor
Ministry of Foreign Affairs
Monrovia, Liberia

Note for media:

  • Open Coverage


12:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a Right to Play school.

Slipway Elementary School
Monrovia, Liberia

Note for media:

  • Pool photo opportunity-open media coverage


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Clara Doe Mvogo, Mayor of Monrovia.

City Hall
Monrovia, Liberia

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a roundtable discussion on Womenâ€™s Leadership.

Ball Room, Main Floor
City Hall
Monrovia, Liberia

Note for media:

  • Open Coverage


7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister attends a dinner given by President Sirleaf.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Note: all times are local
